feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v23.05.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fixed OctoPrint ‘text’ display when idle. by @zachatrocity in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/607
  • Fix: don't stretch non-square logos by @LoV432 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/640
  • Toggle dark mode when prefers-color-scheme changes by @gabe565 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/642
  • Listen on IPv6 by @apearson in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/643
  • Add GHCR Docker image mirror by @gabe565 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/624

New Contributors

  • @zachatrocity made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/607
  • @LoV432 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/640
  • @apearson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/643

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v23.02.2...v23.05.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v23.09.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Immich custom service by @thedroid in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/673
  • PiAlert custom service by @thedroid in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/674
  • feat: add Readarr custom service by @royto in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/671
  • Update link to Portainer apikey guide by @mrindholt in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/697
  • Better documentation for SpeedtestTracker service by @bergpb in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/701

New Contributors

  • @thedroid made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/673
  • @mrindholt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/697
  • @bergpb made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/701

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v23.05.1...v23.09.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v23.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix YAML anchors by @JenswBE in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/714
  • Fix search on page load by @royto in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/687
  • fix: allow disabling IPv6 by @tnyeanderson in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/696
  • Handling empty groups in search function by @vlorian-de in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/692

New Contributors

  • @JenswBE made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/714
  • @tnyeanderson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/696
  • @vlorian-de made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/692

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v23.09.1...v23.10.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.04.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Update customservices.md with Readarr link by @EatMoreChicken in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/757
  • Update README.md by @Alceatraz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/756
  • fix: improve grammar of offline message by @librick in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/736
  • Add OpenHAB custom service by @andreapier in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/744

New Contributors

  • @EatMoreChicken made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/757
  • @Alceatraz made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/756
  • @librick made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/736
  • @andreapier made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.02.1...v24.04.1
